data_table.description: MESA Pericardial Fat Dataset: This is an ancillary study dataset that contains measurements of Pericardial Fat in MESA Classic participants from CT scans.

variable.name: sidno
variable.description: SHARE ID NUMBER

variable.name: visna1
variable.description: VISIT NUMBER

variable.name: pfstha1
variable.description: THICKNESS OF ONE SLICE OF CT SCAN; IT VARIES AMONG THE FIELD CENTERS

variable.name: pfnsa1
variable.description: NUMBER OF SLICES TO INCLUDE IN ORDER TO GET THE TOTAL LENGTH REQUIRED BY THE READING PROTOCOL

variable.name: pfsrna1
variable.description: SERIES NUMBER OF CT SCAN

variable.name: pfnsaa1
variable.description: NUMBER OF THE SLICE IN WHICH LEFT MAIN CORONARY ARTERY IS FIRST SEEN

variable.name: pfvola1
variable.description: VOLUME OF PERICARDIA FAT OBTAINED BASED ON THE MESA READING PROTOCOL, CM^3

variable.name: pfcoma1
variable.description: COMMENTS ABOUT THE QUALITY OF OR PROBLEMS RELATED TO THE MEASUREMENT OF PERICARDIAL FAT

variable.name: lfnsfa1
variable.description: NUMBER OF THE SLICE DOWN FROM THE SLICE IN WHICH THE LIVER IS FIRST SEEN

variable.name: lfnsma1
variable.description: NUMBER OF THE SLICE ON WHICH LIVER FAT ATTENUATION IS MEASURED

variable.name: lfri1a1
variable.description: MEAN VALUE OF LIVER ATTENUATION IN REGION OF INTEREST 1, HOUNSFIELD UNIT

variable.name: lfri2a1
variable.description: MEAN VALUE OF LIVER ATTENUATION IN REGION OF INTEREST 2, HOUNSFIELD UNIT

variable.name: lfri3a1
variable.description: MEAN VALUE OF LIVER ATTENUATION IN REGION OF INTEREST 3, HOUNSFIELD UNIT

variable.name: lfma1
variable.description: AVERAGE OF THE THREE LIVER ATTENUATION MEASURES

variable.name: lfsd1a1
variable.description: STANDARD DEVIATION OF LIVER ATTENUATION IN REGION OF INTEREST 1, HOUNSFIELD UNIT

variable.name: lfsd2a1
variable.description: STANDARD DEVIATION OF LIVER ATTENUATION IN REGION OF INTEREST 2, HOUNSFIELD UNIT

variable.name: lfsd3a1
variable.description: STANDARD DEVIATION OF LIVER ATTENUATION IN REGION OF INTEREST 3, HOUNSFIELD UNIT

variable.name: lfcoma1
variable.description: COMMENTS ABOUT THE QUALITY OF OR PROBLEMS RELATED TO THE MEASUREMENT OF LIVER ATTENUATION

variable.name: bvlena1
variable.description: MAXIMAL DISTANCE FROM THE MIDPOINT OF THE BV_WIDTH LINE TO THE APEX IN THE 4-CHAMBER VIEW, MM

variable.name: bvwida1
variable.description: MAXIMAL DISTANCE BETWEEN THE RCA AND LCX ARTERIES IN THE 4-CHAMBER VIEW, MM

variable.name: bvtpsa1
variable.description: NUMBER OF TOP/FIRST SLICE OF THE HEART

variable.name: bvbtsa1
variable.description: NUMBER OF THE BOTTOM/LAST SLICE OF THE HEART

variable.name: bvmdsa1
variable.description: NUMBER OF SLICES BETWEEN TOP AND BOTTOM OF THE HEART /2

variable.name: bvmxsa1
variable.description: NUMBER OF THE SLICE WHERE THE SHORT AXIS AREA APPEARS TO BE THE GREATEST (IN SAGITAL VIEW)

variable.name: bvmsaa1
variable.description: MAXIMAL TRACED AREA IN SHORT AXIS VIEW, MM^2

variable.name: bvmsna1
variable.description: NUMBER OF THE SLICE AT THE MID OF THE HEART (ADD THE #SLICES/2 TO THE FIRST SLICE NUMBER)

variable.name: bvmaa1
variable.description: TRACED AREA AT MIDPOINT FROM BASE TO APEX, MM^2

variable.name: bvapsa1
variable.description: NUMBER OF THE 6TH SLICE ABOVE THE LAST SLICE

variable.name: bvapaa1
variable.description: TRACED AREA AT THE 6TH SLICE (15 MM) ABOVE APEX, MM^2

variable.name: bvcoma1
variable.description: COMMENTS RELATED TO THE MEASUREMENT OF HEART SIZE

variable.name: bvvola1
variable.description: BIVENTRICULAR VOLUME (CM^3)

variable.name: acovpa1
variable.description: COVERAGE PROBLEM

variable.name: motpa1
variable.description: MOTION PROBLEM

variable.name: noisea1
variable.description: NOISE PROBLEM

variable.name: artifa1
variable.description: ARTIFACT PROBLEM

variable.name: ratiqa1
variable.description: OVERALL RATING OF THE IMAGE QUALITY OF THE CT SCAN

variable.name: reva1
variable.description: SCAN OR READING NEEDS TECHNICAL REVIEW OR NOT

variable.name: verifa1
variable.description: DATA ENTERED HAVE BEEN VERIFIED BY READER OR NOT

variable.name: reada1
variable.description: SCAN HAS BEEN READ OR NOT
